text: I've Got a Horse is a 1938 British comedy film directed by Herbert Smith and starring Sandy Powell, Norah Howard and Felix Aylmer.Wood p.98 ==Plot== Sandy accepts a racehorse called Lightning as settlement for a bad debt. When he enters the horse in a race and it starts doing circus tricks and loses the competition, Sandy realises the animal's future and his own lie in the circus. ==Cast== * Sandy Powell as Sandy * Norah Howard as Alice * Felix Aylmer as Lovatt * Evelyn Roberts as Thomas * Leo Franklyn as Joe * D.A. Clarke-Smith as Fowler, Kings Counsel * Kathleen Harrison as Mabel * Edward Chapman as George * Wilfrid Hyde-White as Police Constable * Frank Atkinson as Bunker ==References== ==Bibliography== * Low, Rachael. Filmmaking in 1930s Britain. George Allen & Unwin, 1985. * Wood, Linda. British Films, 1927-1939.
